also lots of wild nettles and  mint.
enjoy!!

title_short: (6300-408) Guarda - Rua Dona Maria Luísa Godinho

title_short: (6300-566) Guarda - 17 Avenida Monsenhor Mendes do Carmo
description: Laundry 8 minutes walk from the Municipal Park of Campismo. Open every day from 9:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Good local, 9Kg and 19kg washing machine. includes detergent.

name: Quinta das Vinte Quelhas
title: (6300-025) Quinta das Vinte Quelhas
description: Great place to park your van overlooking the Mondego valley in the Serra da Estrela area, shaded by linden trees throughout the park area. Dry compost toilets available, possibility to shower and do laundry. Upon request, Miguel will cook a 4-course vegetarian menu. Possibility of cooking workshops or beekeeping. Water from a mountain spring, 6 donkeys and a goat available. Possibility of donkey hikes, river kayak rentals, paragliding tandems depending on the weather. Aldeias Históricas nearby, tons of mountain viewpoints, sky for bird watching, perfect for BTT downhill, lots of boulders to climb and climbing routes nearby. Possibility to buy seasonal fruit and vegetables from the farm. PS: remember that a fire engine has to drive through the hamlet. So if it can make it, so will your RV, unless it's a really gigantic vehicle. Mine is an old Mercedes 407D 7m long with 72hp and only 4 gears and it gets on the farm well! PPS: If you arrive and nobody is at the farm, just park your van, we might just be visiting bees or working on the top of the mountain. Call us!

title: (6300-245) Bairro da Ribeira - 61 Bairro do Ribeiro
title_short: (6300-245) Bairro da Ribeira - 61 Bairro do Ribeiro

title: (6360) Celorico da Beira -
description:
Campervan spot on a 28 hectare farm with stunning views over the Serra da Estrela. Eco toilet and outdoor solar (hot) shower available.

To reach our farm, follow the M553 from Celorico da Beira to Vide-entre-Vinhas and then continue the same road to Galisteu. Only at this point you can trust your GPS and make your descent to our farm via the last kilometer of dirtroad.

title: (6360-496) Lajeosa do Mondego - 25 Rua do Alto do Monte
title_short: (6360-496) Lajeosa do Mondego - 25 Rua do Alto do Monte

Nice, clean and quiet place in the center of the village. Free service area to empty your tanks and fill them with fresh water. Playground for children, cafes nearby. Tables and barbecues. Public bathroom and showers with free hot water open 24 hours a day and very clean.

title: (6290) Linhares da Beira -

There is a small shady park with benches right next door, and also WC in the village. Access to the 12th century castle is free. The town is very small and quiet.

title: (6360) Lajeosa do Mondego - Unnamed Road
description:
Land under construction, great space to park in peace and quiet in contact with nature, in the town of Aldeia Rica, 5 minutes from the A25 and IP2, it has a river beach 2 km away where you can swim, fish or simply enjoy a day of leisure, it has paths for hiking as well as a football field 5 to 500m. It is located 8 minutes from the historic village of Celorico da Beira, where there are several monuments and castles, close to the service area.
Quiet place to be in contact with nature and its animals. The land has a well with water and in the future wells will be created to discharge waste water from the caravans.
Unit price per vehicle for 5 euros daily.

title: (6290) São Paio - Quinta Da Pedra Alta
title_short: (6290) São Paio - Quinta Da Pedra Alta
description:
We only accept caravans for volunteering .

At the foot of the highest mountain range in Continental Portugal, Serra da Estrela, lays the old and beautiful house built on top of one of the hundreds of giant stones in the central area of ​​Portugal (hence the name of the estate "The Place of the High Stone").

For more than a century, it has been meticulously and tastefully built as a place of relaxation and family reunions and has remained to this day the ideal hiding place for intimate moments in the family.

One of our objectives is to allow nature to thrive, to take a regenerative and organic approach to agriculture, applying Permaculture principles and designs, to interfere as little as possible with the environment, to go about it all in an organic way - one that is not harmful to nature.

We are looking to receive caravans for short/medium/long-term volunteers, but we prefer medium/long term, to help us with all the Permaculture implementation, from the veggie garden, making slow and fast hot compost, human manure, planting trees, building dry toilets, fencing, take care of the horses, chickens, cleaning the terrain, the stables, the wood for fire and wood for several uses, the cut of the dead trees, etc etc etc

title: (6370) Fornos de Algodres - 7 N16
description: Beautiful place located just right riverside of Mondego at picnic areas. Camper length up to 10 m (may be difficult to reverse). Swimming possible (surveillance on Summer). Beautifully situated on a river. Toilets and bar available in Summer.

description:
Santiago Park, Belmonte.
A bit noisy, since the bus stop and parking lot are right next to it, as well as the busy N345 thoroughfare. Disposal & water free. Paved, level surface.
Toilet & shower unfortunately closed due to vandalism. 500 m from the village, restaurant opposite.

title: (6370) - Ponte de Juncais, N 330 km 30,1.

name: Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
title: (6300) Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
title_short: (6300) Parque de Campismo Rural Vale do Beijames
description: The vale do beijames rural camping site is located in one of the most spectacular valleys of the serra da estrela, at 540 meters altitude, ideal for camping and access to the highest and most interesting points of the mountain, little explored. Located a few meters from the river beijames, between the village of vale de amoreira (manteigas) and verdelhos (covilhã), in a magnificent space from which you can get a whole magnitude that impresses, especially the agro-pastoral mosaic, still with open activity traditional. The area reserved for campers is dominated by a small woodland, with hardwoods and a variety of more than 60 species of trees. ​ it is the ideal place to enjoy the best moments and take the best memories of the serra da estrela.

title: (6250-020) Belmonte - Varanda Pilatos Belmonte

The park has 5 or 6 places flat, but the rest is not so flat. Excellent view of the mountain Serra da Estrela, could be windy and cold in winter. Free park and for to visit historic center and the 3 museums.

name: Parque de Campismo Curral do Negro
title: (6290-528) Parque de Campismo Curral do Negro
title_short: (6290-528) Parque de Campismo Curral do Negro
description:
Campsite Curral do Negro is pearl situated In Natural Parc Serra da Estrela.
It has very spacious and rustic camper, tent and caravan pitches quietly located on the top of the mountain (alt. 975 m.) including new glamping facilities. It has a stunning sunset and a view on the valley and it’s village Gouveia. (Which is only 3 kilometers (30 min walk) away from the campsite)

The owners Leonel & Liliana are a very hospitable and enthusiastic Portuguese couple. They give you a warm welcome and make sure you have a great stay here at the camp. They even can prepare you a very good Bacalhau on a wood fired BBQ. If you want them to cook for you then ask them in advance.
There is also a fresh bread service for the morning.  
In the campsite bar you can order drinks and some snacks and make use of the WiFi. Excellent sanitary facilities and hot showers. BBQ facilities, shade places. 
It has a swimming pool of natural water, with water from the mountain.
Directly from this campsite you can make beautiful hikes of several distances. Highly recommended! 

Here people speak Portuguese, English and Spanish.

IMPORTANT NOTE!
It’s very easy to get to the the campsite via a tarmac road, BUT 
Google maps will sent you by default on a narrow road.
Therefor follow this instruction.
FIRST navigate to “PSP - Esquadra de Gouveia” 
(address: Av. Gen. Humberto Delgado 40, 6290-530 Gouveia)
See link: 
And from there you follow the Camping signs “Curral do Negro”

Telephone:

title: (9FFM+39W) Manteigas - Poço do Inferno
description: Carpark next to the Poço do Inferno (know as Hell’s Well), this is a plunge pool at the foot of a 10m waterfall which pours down into a small dark pool. Suitable for swimming (autumn to spring is best as the waterfall is in flow). Also a circular, signed 2.5 km walk leads from the waterfall though woodland and along various streams. Well worth the walk.                               The parking is on the edge of the quite road and is reasonable flat. Picnic benches and a spring are nearby to be enjoyed. Note the road is quite narrow and may not be suitable for larger motorhomes. Hope you enjoy and please respect this special place. View isn’t half bad too.

title: (6320) - 2 Rua do Caminho Novo
description: Located behind the clock tower. Authorization confirmed by the tourist office, obviously respecting the place.

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 31 Largo de São Genésio
description: Beautiful parking place for one or two vans. Overlooking the Castle of Sortelha. A little bit further ahead from the other parking spot behind the clock tower. Í spent the night here, very quiet and amazing views of the castle and the valley. Please always take your garbage with you! No bins around here.

title: (6320) Sortelha - Unnamed Road
description: Do you want to spend a night at a charming place? You are going to have hallucinations and you can also make visits

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 23 Calçada de Santo Antão
description: Sortelha, aldeia histórica, parque junto casa do rancho folclórico aconselhável apenas a carros pequenos ou fourgon

title: (6320-530) Sortelha - 22 Rua Santa Catarina
description: Service area

title: (6260) Manteigas - Caldas de Manteigas
description: Parking near caldas de Manteignas and thermal baths. Good for one night. Possibility of hiking and sport fishing. No service but close city. Sounds of the river and birdsongs on waking.

title: (6260) Manteigas -
description: Parking next to the road on gravel. At the beginning of June surrounded by yellow gorse. Great all-round view. Might be pretty windy. No service, but pure nature!

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Place in full nature near the dam of vale do rossim. Quiet and cool night on the heights. perfect. Fountain and possibility to swim at the dam. Bar very good restaurant.

title: (6420) - N226
description: Parking behind the restaurant, excellent, clean and inexpensive, speaks French very well.

title: (6250-111) Catraia da Caria - 20 Rua dos Eucaliptos
title_short: (6250-111) Catraia da Caria - 20 Rua dos Eucaliptos
description: Nice and calm place, parking of a train station. Space for 4 to 6 vans, quiet.

title: (6290) Nascente do Rio Mondego - N232
description: Source of Mondego. Small picnic area (2 granite tables) and fountain with delicious spring water.

title: (6290) São Paio - N17
description: Gas station with long water hose pipe for filling up.

title: (6290) Gouveia - N17
description: A slightly different supermarket that also sells a lot of gas items for camping. Gas bottles from Campingaz can be exchanged here.

title: (6250) Caria - 2 Rua José Luís Rebelo
description: Very good parking area in service station. Has free water, and pump, has car wash, a café shop for eat or drink some think, fuel, and big parking. To stop or sleep one night. The view of the mountain is wonderful. Toilet very clean. People very nice. Park in size with from 5.15m and 5un. With places up to 12m long.

name: Vale do Rossim Eco resort
title: (6260) Vale do Rossim Eco resort
description: Vale do Rossim Eco resort with campground, near a lake in Serra da Estrela. The campground has lots of shade, parcels not delimited. Has bathrooms, barbeques and sinks.

title: (6250-111) Caria - 22 Rua Fonte do Ruivo
description: Free water fountain, good to drink and good to fill up the tank, has access, next to the road for any size of van. Good view! Next to a Service Staion with good price on diesel. Good stop on the way to Spain, and near Old Historic Villages route.

title: (6320) - N324
description: An esplanade next to a small chapel unobstructed and very easy access to 200m from the spa. Quiet but without shadow. The spa is great and very affordable.

title: (6320) - N324
description: Big park next to and abandoned thermal ruin, and next to a modern hotel thermal spa. You can use the spa has an external, and still sleep in the van. Has a restaurant that you can go to in the hotel. We used the massage session to. Good place, with bike tracks. Good for 2 nights! No noice and very good sky at night.

title: (6320) Termas do Cró - N324
description: Hidden between the ruins of the old thermal baths is a fully functional Eurorelais with drinking water, toilet emptying and a gray water outlet. Parking and staying the night is more comfortable in the parking lot of the new thermal baths, just 100m away.

title: (6250-111) Caria - 35 Rua da Lage da Sobreira
title_short: (6250-111) Caria - 35 Rua da Lage da Sobreira
description: Good parking to sleep, has garbage can. Good view to the mountain. Had a fountain of water very near with free water to fill the tank. Has a playground for kids!

title: () - Rua da Fonte do Serro
description: Great place. Vale do rossim. Lake for swimming, super clear water. Opportunities for canoeing and paddle boating. Snack. There is also a campsite.

title: (6290) Manteigas -
description:
Very nice spot in the Serra d'Estrel.
Shaded morning and evening depending on where you park.
Beautiful pine forests, nice path around the lake and the dam. Quiet night.

title: (3530) Abrunhosa-a-Velha - Unnamed Road
description: Parking by the river accessible by small asphalt road but narrow (40.570933, -7.649091)

title: (6420-240) Trancoso - Zona Industrial de R. 5 de Outubro
title_short: (6420-240) Trancoso - Zona Industrial de R. 5 de Outubro
description: Laundry to wash and dry clothes but also wash your vehicle

address.street: Zona Industrial de R. 5 de Outubro

title: (6320-125) - Casteleiro
description: New Motorhome area, 5€ includes electricity. Very quiet place, near the road but with almost no trafic.

title: (6355) Freixo - N16
description: Nice location for lunch or overnight near a pond. Little shade but quiet place, frequented by local fishermen.

title: (6250-111) Caria - 28 Bairro Santa Ana
description: Free water, good to drink. Has garbage recycling container’s. Calm area.

title: (6300) Castanheira -
description: Mega quiet place in the middle of the most beautiful rock formations Two straight pitches for short 4x4.

title: (6320-261) - 9 Largo da Igreja
description: Special place for buses, larger campers not accessible !! Nice place to relax. There is a beach on a river of running spring water. There are toilet showers for men and women. There are barbecues and a tap at the tables.

title: (6260) - N338
description: No trash. Lost in the Zêzere valley. Small river, clear, cool water, jump possible. Great accessibility (motor home, caravan etc.) Drive slowly to find the path to the right of the main axis.

title: () Trancoso - N226
description: Large car park near the fortifications of Trancoso. Friday market, parking may be inappropriate on Thursday night.

title: (6290) - Largo Professor Pires das Neves
description: Small picnic area very nice with barbecues and access to water Possibility to spend the night but provide wedges because the terrain is sloping Avoid vehicles too long Very little passage, quiet place

title: (6260) R. do Rio Zêzere - N338
description: Natural spot next to a river and in the middle of the glacial valley. No service. Wild camping is prohibited.

title: (6200) Teixoso - CM1014
description: Picnic table, shady and quiet, trash bin and water.

title: (6290-261) - 21 Rua Nova
description:
Big Parking in village Rio Torto, it's free, it's not maintained at this time of year, maybe becus of the Covid19, cafe ( small shop)  around the corner, free toilets in front on church.
this very quiet and beautiful village.
it's alright to spend a night, durning the church is ringing every 30min.

title: () - E802
description: In the middle of the vineyards, splendid view. branches limit the height.

title: (6200) Teixoso - Rua Carlos Mourão, Terlamonte
description: Nice farm near Serra da Estrela, with mountain view. Electricity, internet and shower (best mosaic shower ever!) available for a small fee. Great area to explore - host knows the area very well and can help. Not a commercial place, so no official opening hours. To ask access, please contact phone number available to Pro users.

name: Camping SENHORA DOS VERDES
title: (6290) Camping SENHORA DOS VERDES
description: Camping SENHORA DOS VERDES. We are in a motorhome with 2 children 3 and 6 years old. Very friendly welcome by the boss who speaks French. We are parked under the trees, very relaxing. A playground for children. About 20 euros (pool extra, but very pretty). The restaurant is also very welcoming and the staff very friendly: meal for 4 for 30 euros, wine and coffee included! A very friendly English night watchman, and telling us that he stays awake all night for surveillance. We recommend !

title: (6420-140) Trancoso - 6 Rua Madre Francisca da Conceição
title_short: (6420-140) Trancoso - 6 Rua Madre Francisca da Conceição
description: Only Parking, behind the Saint Luzia Church.

title: (6320-328) Sabugal - 7 Travessa Doutor Francisco Maria Manso
title_short: (6320-328) Sabugal - 7 Travessa Doutor Francisco Maria Manso
description: A large parking on a firm ground, flat in some areas and with a large tree very shady, next to the castle. There is a fountain and public toilets. Small vehicles only.

title: (6320-369) Sabugal - 3 Rua da Devesa
description: Free park near the fire station. No service but there are services nearby.

title: (6320-394) Sabugal - 6,6320-394 Rua Nova do Rio
description: Nice little corner with picnic tables near the river, but only accessible for small van

title: (6270) - Unnamed Road
description: In addition to the road a small parking area with breathtaking views. In October a very quiet place, hardly any traffic.

title: (6270) Seia -
description: Compared to other areas close by, this layby offered us very good shelter from the wind. Pretty leveled, too.

title: () Sabugal - 1-3 Bairro do Outeiro
description: Service terminal - water drain wc -

title: (6320) Sabugal - 5 Rua Estádio Municipal
description: Laundry self-service

title: (6320-202) - 7 N233
description: Level parking. lots of dogs barking and howling most of the night. there was a bit of road noise. free wifi although very slow

title: (6200) Covilhã - 12 Rua Humberto Delgado
description: Fuel station (low cost), with free-WiFi, has Coffee shop, little supermarket, bathroom, place to park, walk the dog, water, and free pressure check for tires. Has a big supermarket in 50m. Good stop, has place to park any size.

title: (6355) Porto Ovelha - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful place to stay out of beach season. beautiful walking paths and good quiet regional rodas for biking. very near, walking, there is the Martins restaurant, very good and cheap.

title: (6320) - Barragem do Sabugal
description: Fountain with tap. In a bend, between the dam and Sabugal, so it is difficult to park for large camper vans.

title: (6200-027) Covilhã - 2B Rua Humberto Delgado
description: Picnic area with free barbecue. Park in front in the supermarket were it has also free Wi-Fi and WC.

title: (6320) Aldeia de Santo António -
description:
Free parking day night with table, barbecue and washing up area with free drinking water near the dam and a small church.
ideal to spend one or more nights in peace.
The slightly sloping land can accommodate several CCs.
the forest firefighters came by and confirmed the tranquility of the place.

title: (6270) Loriga -
description:
Large parking spot just a bit ahead of the two other spots indicated on the same road, even more flat and with a great view on the valley and the town of Manteigas. Space for
 2/3 small vans. We had a calm night, even though some passersby in the afternoon and evening. From this point one can hike down the road towards the cascate of Poço de Inferno and eventually Manteigas. Alternatively there is are nice hikes from the picknick spot down the road, called Covão d'Ametade. On the way to that spot there is an amazing water fountain!

title: (6200-221) Covilhã - 73 Rua 30 de Junho
description: Drinking water fountain, free and good to drink, or to fill tanks. It has a place to Wash your clothes (very commum in the area). Very large flow. You may need a hose.

title: (6320) Sabugal - Unnamed Road
description: Great spot on the lake, swimming, it passes in heavy weight. No services.

title: (6320) - Barragem do Sabugal
description: Just before the notified car park, a small dirt road runs along the lake. possibility of finding other spots in the middle of nature, shaded and more out of sight.

title: (6250) Caria - Unnamed Road
description: Park near little “Monte do Bispo” dam, you can fish, hikes along the water Chanel or bike and motorbike. I would not recommend to swim. Nice view to Serra da Estrela mountain. Good for one or two nights of pure nature!

title: (6270) Lagoa da -
description: Natural wonder COVAO DOS CONCHOS This extraordinary lake can only be reached on foot with good shoes. We looked for a parking space nearby and the next day we went on foot in search of this incredible natural wonder. This excursion is worthwhile for all nature lovers.

title: (6260) São Pedro - N338
description: Fresh spring water fountain

title: (6270) Loriga - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet parking lot surrounded by nature. No prohibition signs. Only birdsong :)

title: (6270) Sabugueiro - 13 Rua da Rua Beirinha
description: Flat parking near the chapel, grocery bar and restaurant a few meters, very welcoming and very friendly people. Perfect parking in the mountains and near homes, safe.

title: (6320) - Unnamed Road
description: At the top of a ridge bordering a small, relatively quiet road. A flat place with a view over the valley. Space for several vehicles. I spent a quiet night there. The spot is clean, thank you for picking up your waste. No services, possible to cross goats.

title: (6260) São Pedro - N338
description: A bit of the main road is this small place suitable for a van sheltered from the wind. Splendid view of the mountains and situated directly on the hiking route. No services and unfortunately a bit of trash but not too bad.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 4 Alameda da Europa
description: GPL fuel station, with every kind of bottles and pump. Has also diesel, it closes at 19h and it’s closed at lunch time, but it’s the only GPL pump station in 20km.

title: (6270) Seia -
description: Path perpendicular to the small road that leads to the n339 road in the direction of sabugeiro. Extremely quiet. No services. Very beautiful view

title: (6400) Pinhel - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and calm water dam. Secluded but safe place. Better if you have a kayak or canoe. Forbidden to stay the night

title: (6090-716) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - 14 N233
title_short: (6090-716) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - 14 N233
description: Drinking water

title: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - Unnamed Road
title_short: (6090) Vale da Senhora da Póvoa - Unnamed Road
description: Parking space in front of sanctuary, slightly sloping but very quiet.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - 29 Rua dos Carqueijais
title_short: (6215) Cortes do Meio - 29 Rua dos Carqueijais
description: Large park inside little village inside mountain reserved park at 1500m altitude. Good quiet place inside nature.

title: () - N340
description: Really nice spot under the trees near the river . Very quiet in the middle of nowhere. Good to visit the natural area around there. Small road access but good opportunity to turn around at the end.

title: (6270) Loriga -
description: Place in the middle of nature NO passage 360 view access to the van or 2-seater van

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Normal parking inside the little village of Penhas da Saude. Very quiet and nature near by. Good for 1 or 2 days. Walking places and mountain trails. Bar and restaurant less than 2min on foot. For all sizes of van. Altitude 1550m it's a mountain place to park and sleep. To eat we recommend "Casa do Clube" restaurant. They have quick and not expenside meals, tapas and good wine!

title: (6200) Covilhã - 56 Rua do Pinho Manso
description: Public park, serves also for a winter swimming pool, park is free, no noice but no services around. Far from city center, but it has a walking bridge and a free elevator to the city center. Playground is on the upper part near the school. The park is not flat, but it is silent and good to sleep. Upper in the road it is flat, and also good to park, long veicules, but it is near the road. There is a hike circuit passing here!

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Free parking inside the village, flat and sunny. Calm but with no services.

title: (6320) Sabugal -
description: At the edge of the lake, quiet corner at the end of a dead end (possibility of continuing on a dirt road)

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Good place to park, free but with no services. Very calm in the village.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Place to park day or night. Free parking and free water, public toilet, garbage. There is a restaurant nearby. At altitude of 1500m a lot of nature. Good place to sleep and walk in the day. Picnic place with tables and good view of the mountain.

title: (6260) - N338
description: Small source

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - Rua Nave da Areia
title_short: (6215) Cortes do Meio - Rua Nave da Areia
description: This was a famous swimming poll in the 70’s but it was renovated in 2020. In has place to park at least 5 van’s but is is not flat. You can sleep 50m away. Has a famous restaurant next door. Good place for the day. In the national park at altitude 1550m. Water a little bit cold. Swim till 15 September.

title: () - M 583 road
description: Nice natural platform at 630m high just on banks of Távora river, that here has small dam and a small old stone bridge. In Winter and Spring, on the grass. Very calm night accompanied by the singing of frogs. No services.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: A flat space next to the road. Beautiful view over the lake. Easy accessible, room for 5 moterhomes.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio - N339
description: Very nice stop along the road but facing a dam. You can spend the night there, close to restaurants. very quiet place.

title: (6200-051) Covilhã - LB Avenida Frei Heitor Pinto
title_short: (6200-051) Covilhã - LB Avenida Frei Heitor Pinto
description: Laundry Self Service dificult to park near, but in 5min on foot near the Fireman you have huge free place to park.

title: (6200) Covilhã - 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa
title_short: (6200) Covilhã - 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa
description: Very big free central park in city. With free Wc.

address.street: 37 Rua Doutor António Plácido da Costa

title: (6200) Covilhã - 1 Rua Francisco Rodrigues Taborda
description: Park in paved ground, lots of space, has a garden next if you climb the stairs and cross the train line. Very calm at night. Has recycling garbage near. Excellent for 1 night sleep, and if you want to walk the dog.

title: (6200-073) Covilhã - N339
description: Viewpoint at an altitude of 1050 m over the city. Called ”Miradouro da Varanda dos carquejais” important view point of the valley “Cova da Beira”, check more in internet. 8 places to park any van. Has a water point, garbage and mountain bike trails around.

title: (6200) Covilhã -
description: Train station, free parking outside and free toilets, has a coffee shop inside. Big car park outside.

title: (6215) Cortes do Meio -
description: A gravel and a tarmac car park near the only ski resort in Portugal. The place is at the ruins of the cable car. On one side the beautiful view of the Torre, on the other a small reservoir. The road is close but no traffic at night.

title: (6200-025) Covilhã - 5 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Self Service laundry, during the day you can leave and pick up later. They have service of iron shirts and other clothes. I will put the prices later! Has WiFi! Not easy to park, but with some patience.
